siyalla awasan wi atha...aawasaya idiripita thaba thibu putuwe wadi wi gath ma awata parisaraya narambaamin sitiyemi.putuwa...mbaaw..pansalaka putuwaka mese ma wadi wi sitinne mage jiwithaye prathama wathawataya..ehi yam nuhuru nupurudu swabhawayak atha..dan ithin eya ese wiya yuthuya...udasana sita sidu wu siyaluma siduwim awasana pansale siti boho deneku pitathwa yana ladi.ithiriwa athi swamin wahansela kihipa deneku dahawala thibu dadi hiru rasin galawenu was aawasaya thulata wi keti nindakata wati sitiyoya.thawath pirimi lamun kihipa deneku bana maduwa thula radi sitinu daknata atha.ee hara ma asalama bima wathira sitiye pansale siti kalu ballayi...aya ma asalin selawimatawath kamathi nathi seyaki.methuwak dawas pansale randi siti bali kikkiya ma samaga etharamma suhada nowiya..namuth ada dahawala siyalu winaya karmayan awasan siwuru perawa ma bana maduwen pitathata pamini mohothe itha wishmitha ayurin ma kara duwa aa balliya ugura yatin nagana amuthuma aakaraye shabdayak pita karamin mage wata diwa yamin bima peralemin sathutin natannata wiya...bala siti ayada eyin puduma wu bawa ma dutimi.balliyata ese hasirennata tharam wishesha hethuwak nothibuni.eda patan ma asalama nithara randi sitimata purudu wu aya nirathuru mage asa gatena manaye sitimata waga bala gaththaya...samadama ma udasana nawaya hamare sita dahaya hamara pamana wana thek kalaya gatha kale pirith potha padam karanu wasya...tharamak hada naga pirith kiyannata purudu puhunu wemin sitina ema payakata aasanna kalaya thuladi ma asalin selawenne balliya nam nowe...awasanaye pas wasaraka pawidi diwiya nima karannata ma thiranaya karanu laba ee waga dayaka karakadinhata danwa ema gamanata sathi dekak pamana thibiyadi dinak udasana dahayata pamana aawasaya idiripita hansi putuwata wi kendarayak balamin siti ma asalata pamini kalu balliya monawado kiyannata men kediri gannata wu athara ee sandaha wishesha hethuwak nothibini.sulu welawak ee desa awadhanaya yomu kala ma "kalu...
